name: Chicken Inc.
description:
As the CEO of the Chicken Inc., how would you like to run your business?

There are five kinds of machines: stove, press, shaving, laser and pierce. Intensify them for more efficiency. Once your got enough money, improve the goods in the shop to sale more!

Now, start your work and enjoy being a Billionaire.

Features:
* Suitable for all ages, no skills required.
* No time limits, take a look at your boring time to relax.
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
